title: [feature request] DataLoaders for Video Datasets
body_html:
In my opinion adding a dataloader for video data-sets would be a nice idea. Looking at deep learning success currently, in future more and more emphasis would be on video data-sets/ understanding videos.
The other day I needed to load NTU RGB Video Dataset and I needed to write opencv scripts for loading the avi files and would haver loved some inbuilt dataloader.
What are your views on it?
